article: Dear Peter, I want to tell  _  about our school. Our school is  _  interesting. And it is also full of  _  . Our school is not  near  my home, so I go to school  _  bus. The school is very  _  . It is very big, too. Our classroom building has five  _  . My classroom is on the  _  floor. Our library is big. There are two reading rooms in it. We can read magazines there. My favourite place is the playground. We go there for  _  every afternoon. And we have nice teachers, too. They are nice to  _  and their lessons are interesting. I am happy at this school! Sandy
